mapper.sql: SELECT device_rent.id, device_rent.mac, device_rent.sales_id, device_rent.dealer_id, device_rent.admin_id, device_rent.is_rented, device_rent.sdcn, device_rent.returned, device_rent.create_time, device_rent.rent_time, device_rent.check_time, auth_sales.username salesName FROM device_rent, auth_sales WHERE device_rent.sales_id = auth_sales.id
mapper.select: SELECT sales_id FROM device_rent WHERE mac=#{mac}
AND device_rent.sales_id= #{salesId} ORDER BY device_rent.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO device_rent (mac, sales_id, dealer_id, admin_id) VALUES (#{mac}, #{salesId}, #{dealerId}, #{adminId})
mapper.update: UPDATE device_rent SET sales_id = #{salesId}, dealer_id = #{dealerId}, admin_id = #{adminId} WHERE mac = #{mac}
UPDATE device_rent SET returned = 1, sdcn = 0, check_time=now() WHERE mac = #{mac}
UPDATE device_rent SET is_rented = 1, sdcn = 1, rent_time=now() WHERE mac=#{mac}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM device_rent WHERE is_rented=0 AND sales_id=#{salesId}
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM device_rent WHERE sdcn = 1 AND sales_id=#{salesId}
